scripts.restart: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const {spawn}=require('child_process');const pid=fs.existsSync('.pid')?fs.readFileSync('.pid','utf-8'):null;if(pid){try{process.kill(pid,'SIGTERM');console.log('Terminated previous process:',pid)}catch(e){console.log('No previous process found')}}setTimeout(()=>{const proc=spawn('node',['dist/index.js'],{stdio:'inherit',detached:true});proc.on('spawn',()=>console.log('Started new process:',proc.pid));proc.on('error',(err)=>console.error('Failed to start process:',err));fs.writeFileSync('.pid',String(proc.pid));proc.unref()},1000)"
